subject: Basketball
Assaults
lead_paragraph: The Indiana Pacers draft pick Lance Stephenson, one of the nation’s top prospects as a high school player in Brooklyn, pushed his girlfriend down a flight of stairs, grabbed her and hit her head on the bottom step, prosecutors said.
snippet: The Indiana Pacers draft pick Lance Stephenson, one of the nation’s top prospects as a high school player in Brooklyn, pushed his girlfriend down a flight of stairs, grabbed her and hit her head on the bottom step, prosecutors said.
